articles.title: Google announces health tool to identify skin conditions - The Verge
articles.description: Google previewed a new artificial intelligence health tool that can identify skin conditions based on photos. It can not diagnose a condition, but it will suggest possibilities. It may launch later this year.

The company demoed the tool at I/O, and it could launch this year
